alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 11:59PM AKST until January 23 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW CONTINUES ACROSS THE NORTHERN PANHANDLE... .Snowfall continues across the northern panhandle with some pockets of freezing rain along the transition zone between Kake and along the outer coast to Yakutat. Over the inner channels near Juneau, snow has started to become wetter but temperatures have remained cold enough to stay as snow. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway and Haines Borough. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow will reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For the Haines area, greatest snowfall amounts are expected over the Chilkat Peninsula.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
